DOC.brief_summary: This study is based on the analysis of psychological and social questionnaires filled in by diabetic patients whose glycemic balance will be assessed by measuring blood levels of glycated haemoglobin. The aim is to compare glycemic balance by measuring HbA1c in diabetic patients (type 1 and 2) according to whether they have a Type A or B psychosomatic profile evaluated by the Bortner self-questionnaire.
DOC.criteria: patients who have been given information about the research patients with National Health Insurance diabetic patients (type 1 or 2) patients > 18 ans Adult patients under guardianship or intellectually dependent patients without National Health Insurance
